ns1:ServiceDescription.description: A grid service for the provisioning and management of grid users accounts. Dorian provides an integration point between external security domains and the grid, allowing accounts managed in external domains to be federated and managed in the grid. Dorian allows users to use their existing credentials to authenticate to the grid.

ns4:Method.description: Gets the Service Security Metadata
ns4:Method.name: getServiceSecurityMetadata

ns4:Method.description: Submits an application for an account with a the Dorian Identity Provider.
ns4:Method.name: registerWithIdP

ns4:Method.description: Obtain a list of users accounts within the Dorian IdP, meeting a specified search criteria.
ns4:Method.name: findIdPUsers

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Update the account information for a Dorian IdP user.
ns4:Method.name: updateIdPUser

ns4:Exception.description: The user specified does not exist.
ns4:Exception.name: NoSuchUserFault

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Remove an IdP user account.
ns4:Method.name: removeIdPUser

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Create a proxy certificate. (This method is DEPRECATED, please use requestUserCertificate)
ns4:Method.name: createProxy

ns4:Exception.description: The IdP's user policy reported an error.
ns4:Exception.name: UserPolicyFault

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Obtains the Dorian CA certificate.
ns4:Method.name: getCACertificate

ns4:Method.description: Gets a list of the IdPs trusted by Dorian.
ns4:Method.name: getTrustedIdPs

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Add a Trusted Identity Provider to Dorian.
ns4:Method.name: addTrustedIdP

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Update the information for a Trusted IdP.
ns4:Method.name: updateTrustedIdP

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Remove a TrustedIdP.
ns4:Method.name: removeTrustedIdP

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Obtain a list of grid users accounts within the Dorian, meeting a specified search criteria.
ns4:Method.name: findGridUsers

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Removes a grid user account.
ns4:Method.name: removeGridUser

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Get a list of the Trusted IdP user policies supported by Dorian.
ns4:Method.name: getGridUserPolicies

ns4:Exception.description: Client does not have permission to perform the request.
ns4:Exception.name: PermissionDeniedFault

ns4:Method.description: Authentication Service interface for authenticating with the Dorian IdP.
ns4:Method.name: authenticate

ns4:Exception.description: The DorianIdP could obtain the attributes needed to issue a valid SAML assertion.
ns4:Exception.name: InsufficientAttributeFault

ns4:Method.description: Authentication Service interface for authenticating with the Dorian IdP.
ns4:Method.name: authenticateUser

ns4:Method.description: This method allows a user with a Dorian IdP account to change their password. (This method is DEPRECATED, please use changeLocalUserPassword)
ns4:Method.name: changeIdPUserPassword

ns4:Method.description: This method determines whether or not a IdP user exists.
ns4:Method.name: doesLocalUserExist

ns4:Method.description: This method allows a user with a Dorian IdP account to change their password.
ns4:Method.name: changeLocalUserPassword

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an administrator to update a user certificate record.
ns4:Method.name: updateUserCertificate

ns4:Method.description: This method allow a user to request a short term user certificate.
ns4:Method.name: requestUserCertificate

ns4:Method.description: This method allows an admin to search for user certificates issued by the Dorian CA.
ns4:Method.name: findUserCertificates
